Html:
hi again!

without wanting to be a pain in the #$%, could you work on a method to center a drawing in a cell?

i would do it, but i'm clueless on relating the cell widht in cm's with the offset, which is measured in pixels (i guess)... any suggestions for that so i can try it immediately?

thanks!
Try doing exactly the same in Excel. If you drag a cell's width, you can read the width in a tooltip.
